attributes.action: Leave the EU without a deal on 29th March 2019
attributes.additional_details: Leaving without a deal leaves the Government in the best possible position to negotiate ongoing bilateral trade agreements with other nations including the EU.
attributes.background: The U.K. electorate voted in 2016 to leave the EU. the government has been unable to make an acceptable deal. The only option available leaves the U.K. tied to the EU with no way to get out. Revoking article 50 would be a betrayal of the commitment made by parliament To leave on 29th March.
